## Title Analysis

*Chrome extension and backend to save the titles of pages you visit*

### Dependancies

- Linux host
- PHP
- `php_sqlite` PHP extension
- Chromium based web browser (currently supports Google Chrome and Chromium for dependancy checking)

![Google Chrome](https://img.shields.io/badge/Google%20Chrome-4285F4?style=for-the-badge&logo=GoogleChrome&logoColor=white)
![Vivaldi](https://img.shields.io/badge/Vivaldi-EF3939?style=for-the-badge&logo=Vivaldi&logoColor=white)
![Edge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Edge-0078D7?style=for-the-badge&logo=Microsoft-edge&logoColor=white)

### Install/Dev usage
 - `git clone https://github.com/lucasburlingham/titleAnalysis.git`
 - `cd titleAnalysis`
 - `make`
 - `make newdb`
 - `make devserver` 

 For more permenant uses, move these files into the root directory of your webserver and make sure PHP works. Please note that the `install.php` script will not be able to prompt the user to install the extension when using this method.
